actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide a civil penalty for persons owning any vehicles which are on Federal recreational properties without having any litter bags.

summary.text: Requires any vehicle which is on Federal property used primarily for outdoor recreational purposes to have a litter bag attached to the inside of such vehicle. Provides for a $500 civil penalty for each violation of such requirement. Allows the head of the agency concerned to compromise any such civil penalty.

titles.title: A bill to provide a civil penalty for persons owning any vehicles which are on Federal recreational properties without having any litter bags.
